plot outline: The story revolves around "Stephen", an honest, sincere and duty bound person who lost every dear and near things in his battle against an established corrupted system. An honest person could be a prey to the evil circumstances. His otherwise happy world turned upside down due to a particular incident. On a particular day, when some notorious criminals avenged him for being righteous. These mishaps turned him to a drunkard and worthless character. In the end, he regains his lost world and the story concludes happily. This is the victory of Virtues vs Vices.
title: Rakshapurushan
plot: The story of _Rakshapurushan_ (qv) revolves around Stephen, an honest man whose life descends into chaos after he loses everything dear to him in the battle against a corrupt system.

The story revolves around "Stephen", an honest, sincere and duty bound person who lost every dear and near things in his battle against an established corrupted system. An honest person could be a prey to the evil circumstances. His otherwise happy world turned upside down due to a particular incident. On a particular day, when some notorious criminals avenged him for being righteous. These mishaps turned him to a drunkard and worthless character. In the end, he regains his lost world and the story concludes happily. This is the victory of Virtues vs Vices.::Jibin George Sebastian
